dcterms:creator: Edwin Stoudenmire
David J Schwab
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a well-known dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 28x28 pixel grayscale images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: Lars Onsager
dcterms:description: The 2-D Ising model is a mathematical model of ferromagnetism in statistical mechanics. It consists of a grid of spins that can be in one of two states, representing magnetic moments that can be either up or down.
dcterms:title: 2-D Ising model

dcterms:creator: Zhao-Yu Han
Jun Wang
Heng Fan
Lei Wang
Pan Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of handwritten digits used in generative modeling, specifically for training models to represent the joint distribution of pixel values in images of handwritten digits.
dcterms:title: Handwritten digits (used in generative modeling)
